segments.text: I notice the angled view of the kitchen right away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman facing left, drying a plate with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is so calm amid the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs unchecked, water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming fast on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Counter has stacks of dishes to her side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Left side shows open cabinets and the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on a two-step stool that's clearly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched up, hand inside grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're teaming up for this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside looks so orderly and bright.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside hazards make me anxious for them all.
segments.speaker: PAR
